body_html: I splited the PR into two commits. The first commit switches the InputBuffer to BufferedInputStream only (and drop the need of Seek() call). The second commit adds the gzip and zlib process. That may make it easy to follow.
body_text: I splited the PR into two commits. The first commit switches the InputBuffer to BufferedInputStream only (and drop the need of Seek() call). The second commit adds the gzip and zlib process. That may make it easy to follow.
body: I splited the PR into two commits. The first commit switches the InputBuffer to BufferedInputStream only (and drop the need of `Seek()` call). The second commit adds the gzip and zlib process. That may make it easy to follow.
